summary: The Cybermen are a fictional race of cyborgs in the British television series Doctor Who.
full_text: Scorpius, first published in 1988, is the seventh novel by John Gardner featuring Ian Fleming's secret agent, James Bond. Carrying the Glidrose Publications copyright, it was first published in the United Kingdom by Hodder & Stoughton  and in the United States by Putnam.
title: Scorpius (novel)
